package.name: Mail_Mime
package.summary: Provides classes to create and decode mime messages.
package.description: Provides classes to deal with creation and manipulation of mime messages: - mime.php: Create mime email, with html, attachments, embedded images etc. - mimePart.php: Advanced method of creating mime messages. - mimeDecode.php - Decodes mime messages to a usable structure. - xmail.dtd: An XML DTD to acompany the getXML() method of the decoding class. - xmail.xsl: An XSLT stylesheet to transform the output of the getXML() method

release.notes: This is the initial release of the Mime_Mail package.
